price: Nta ngaruka zizabagiraho ndetse nta n’ubwo zizatuma bata ubwenge
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
